CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hour Loop Inc is an online retailer engaged in e-commerce retailing in the U.S. market. The product categories include home and garden decor, toys, kitchenware, apparels, and electronics. The company has only one segment, which is online retail (e-commerce).
